description: I am 49 years old and live in Guildford, Surrey. I have been developing websites since 2012 after changing careers from being a proprietary market trader.

title: Thinking outside the box
description: 'Too often we give our children answers to remember rather than problems to solve...'

title: What else ...
description: I grew up in South Africa and moved to  the UK with my wife and 2 daughters in 2007. I enjoy motor sports and in particular MotoGP and F1 racing. I also enjoy boxing and UFC.
